rev.desc.rev.desc: Modified the start panel to allow for displaying the type of device in the error message. Moved the following line:
$L.class=$INTO.CLASS up one line. The next line changed from:

if ($L.mode="up") then if (not null($L.class)) then ($L.no.rel.msg=scmsg(58, "icm", {$L.name, $L.class+" parent"})) else ($L.no.rel.msg=scmsg(58, "icm", {$L.name, "parent"})) else if (not null($L.class)) then ($L.no.rel.msg=scmsg(58, "icm", {$L.name, $L.class+" child"})) else ($L.no.rel.msg=scmsg(58, "icm", {$L.name, "child"}))
Increased max hits on fetch.query panel from 250 to 500.

descript.descript: Modified the start panel to allow for displaying the type of device in the error message. Moved the following line:
$L.class=$INTO.CLASS up one line. The next line changed from:

if ($L.mode="up") then if (not null($L.class)) then ($L.no.rel.msg=scmsg(58, "icm", {$L.name, $L.class+" parent"})) else ($L.no.rel.msg=scmsg(58, "icm", {$L.name, "parent"})) else if (not null($L.class)) then ($L.no.rel.msg=scmsg(58, "icm", {$L.name, $L.class+" child"})) else ($L.no.rel.msg=scmsg(58, "icm", {$L.name, "child"}))
Increased max hits on fetch.query panel from 250 to 500.
